data.message: Hello again Facebook! Thanks for tell me how to see my publications.Now I can see them! You are the best and very helpful! But I have a question.How can I use my facebook as a page?

replies.message: Hey there. Have you tried using these tips to create a Page? Learn more: http://bit.ly/2bazNhb. -Jordan
i  like  my  facebook  coneck  my  celhpon

Facebook WHY should anyone start a page when after all the hard work and time, Facebook will just unpublish it  There was nothing wrong with my one page and I can't get an answer.  What is wrong with lsting famous birthdays and old songs  Please can a real human look and see why.  I am not the only one there were thousands unpublished two weeks ago again for no reason so why bother.

l hello all any help me please ./ when i login give to me a massage this Unfortunately, you won't be able to access your account while we're reviewing these additional documents. We appreciate your patience, and we'll get back to you as soon as we can
